title:
Experts Predict Incoming Bull Cycle as LNEX Raises $500k in 72hrs Leaving BCH And DOGE Behind 
						Though bearish momentum has permeated the market for large swathes of Q3, most analysts purport that the bull run is...
author: Unknown
summary:
Hey everyone! We’ve got some exciting insights from an article discussing the shifting tides in the crypto market, particularly as we head into Q4. Despite a bearish vibe throughout much of Q3, many analysts are predicting a long-overdue bull cycle could be on the horizon. Bitcoin has recently surged past the $60,000 mark, giving a lift to various altcoins, although Bitcoin Cash seems to be lagging behind, showing a mere 7% increase this month and experiencing declining trading volumes. With investors now favoring more promising prospects like Sui and the new DEX swapping gem, Lunex Network, Bitcoin Cash may need to step up its game to attract attention.

Speaking of Lunex Network, this platform is generating a lot of buzz for its potential to revolutionize the decentralized exchange (DEX) space. The article highlights Lunex’s impressive fundraising success—raising $500k in just 72 hours—and anticipates massive rallies that could see returns of 1800% or more within the next year. One of the standout features is its user-friendly approach that eliminates KYC verification, allowing for anonymous and speedy trading across over 50,000 blockchains. With staking rewards and a deflationary mechanism in place, Lunex Network seems poised for significant growth, making it a hot topic for potential investors looking for the next big opportunity in crypto.

Let’s keep an eye on how this plays out! With the ongoing meme coin rallies—especially with Dogecoin gaining traction—there’s a lot happening that could influence market sentiment. It’ll be interesting to discuss whether these trends will hold through election season and what that means for both established coins and new projects like Lunex.
